type.description: Row type describing the component stored in this record.

id.description: Component ID (bus, branch, generator, load or transformer).

name.description: Human readable label for the component.

voltage_kv.description: Base voltage for a bus (null for edges or equipment that do not specify it).

from_bus.description: Source bus (edges or equipment describing a connection).

to_bus.description: Destination bus (edges or equipment describing a connection).

resistance.description: Series resistance for branches; null for buses, loads, generators, or transformers without a resistance field.

reactance.description: Series reactance for branches; null for buses, loads, generators, or transformers without a reactance field.

active_power_mw.description: Active power injection (positive generation, negative load) recorded when Node::Gen/Node::Load entries exist.

reactive_power_mvar.description: Reactive power injection for generator/load nodes.
